page.title: 06Employment in Exbourne
page.content: There are aproximately 300 people in the Exbourne area.About 75 of these are O.A.P.s.We did a job survey of parents in the village school.Here are our results.1 Estate agent:1 Riding stables owner:9 Farmers:1 Campsite/ Farmer:1 Barman:1 Bank Manager:1 Self employed coil winder:1 Teacher:1 Carpenter:1 Sales rep. in farming implements:2 Builders:1 Cheese factory worker:1 Cattle cake manufacturers worker:1 Garage owner:1 Clay quarry worker:1 University Research student. Pre-1945,practically everyone in the village worked on the farms. Now only the owner and his immediate family work each farm.More people commute than work here. Other than working on the family farm, school leavers have to find jobs else where.
